San_Buenaventura_(Ventura).Foothill Technology High School: Foothill Technology High School is a high school located on 100 Day Road in Ventura, California. It has been a California Distinguished School since 2005 and won the National Blue Ribbon Award in 2006, and 2012. It is ranked 78th in California and 419th in the US by U.S. News & World Report in 2012.
